extensionDescription.message: Opens new tabs from the location bar, by conditions.

config.newTabForSameOrigin.caption.message: For a URI which has the origin same to the current page

config.openAsChildIfSameOrigin.label.message: Open as a "child" of the current tab

config.recycleBlankCurrentTab.label.message: Recycle current blank tab, instead of new tab

config.recycleTabUrlPattern.label.message: Recycle more tabs with URI matchis to following regular expression:
